channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- MapPress Maps for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- MapPress Maps for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-0421|2024-08-01T18:04:49.663Z -- unknown -- mappress%20maps%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MapPress Maps for WordPress plugin before 2.88.16 does not ensure that posts to be retrieve via an AJAX action is a public map, allowing unauthenticated users to read arbitrary private and draft posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-0420|2024-08-01T18:04:49.657Z -- unknown -- mappress%20maps%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MapPress Maps for WordPress plugin before 2.88.15 does not sanitize and escape the map title when outputting it back in the admin dashboard, allowing Contributors and above roles to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-0421|2024-02-12T16:07:31.072Z -- unknown -- mappress%20maps%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MapPress Maps for WordPress plugin before 2.88.16 does not ensure that posts to be retrieve via an AJAX action is a public map, allowing unauthenticated users to read arbitrary private and draft posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-0420|2024-06-04T17:58:48.789Z -- unknown -- mappress%20maps%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The MapPress Maps for WordPress plugin before 2.88.15 does not sanitize and escape the map title when outputting it back in the admin dashboard, allowing Contributors and above roles to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
